title: REC to extend term loan of Rs 1,869 cr for Kiru Hydro Electric Project in Kishtwar
description: REC Limited provides Rs 1,869.265 crores term loan to CVPPPL for Kiru Hydro Electric Project on river Chenab. NHPC and JKSPDC joint venture CVPPPL to undertake multiple hydro projects totaling 3,094 MW capacity.
